name: SPOOC
description:
This screaming boi is getting out of control! Join Spooc on his adventure through Trashtown while he looks for food and people to scare.

Spooc is a game about a small brave possum who you'd not want to mess with. Search for food, rummage through the dumpsters, scream at people and break what you want. It's your town. 

The game was made during GMTK Game Jam 2020 for the Out of Control theme and will be updated in the future. Our team wants to make this possum's world a playground for you to enjoy. 
We plan on expanding the town and adding the story and quests. 

Let us know what you think of our game thus far! Donations are not needed, but would be highly appreciated. This is our team's first project and we plan on making it the best we can.

The assets used are a mix of those from Synty Studios' Polygon City and Town Packs and our own models. Sounds are our own Level Designer's screams of despair, and sounds used according to the Creative Commons Licences.

Controls:
  • Use WSAD to move 
  • LMB will make you hit stuff
  • Scream using the RMB
  • You can change actions using the Scroll
  • ESC will pause your game so you can take a break
Our Team:
  • Animations and running the team of complete trash people: Aleksandra Nowakowska
  • Making sure nothing works as it should: Michal Paszek
